metadata.feature_description: Provides DNN portal roles for URL path authentication configuration

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Retrieve all roles for current portal

steps.action: Logged in as SuperUser and navigated to Site Settings > Search > Crawling tab
steps.expected: Crawling tab should be visible with URL Paths section
steps.actual: Crawling tab loaded successfully showing URL Paths section with multiple URL entries

steps.action: Clicked edit icon on URL path http://localhost:8081 to open URL path settings
steps.expected: URL path settings form should open with DNN Role Impersonation dropdown
steps.actual: URL path settings form opened showing URL, Sitemap URL, DNN Role Impersonation dropdown, Enable Spidering toggle, and Windows Authentication fields

steps.action: Clicked on DNN Role Impersonation dropdown to view available roles
steps.expected: Dropdown should expand showing portal roles
steps.actual: Dropdown expanded successfully displaying 11 portal roles: Administrators, Community Manager, Content Editors, Content Managers, Moderators, Registered Users, Subscribers, Test Custom Role, Translator (en-US), Unverified Users, Wiki Test Group

steps.expected: Role should be selected and displayed in the dropdown
steps.actual: Administrators role was successfully selected and displayed in the DNN Role Impersonation field

observations: The DNN Role Impersonation dropdown successfully retrieves and displays all portal roles including system roles (Administrators, Registered Users, Unverified Users) and custom roles (Test Custom Role, Wiki Test Group, etc.)
Role names are displayed correctly with proper formatting
The dropdown includes a search field for filtering roles when the list is long
Both system roles and custom portal-specific roles are included in the list
